site_name: 31 Holland Park and 7 Holland Park Mews, LONDON, W11 3TA
description: Details required by condition 3a, b, c and d (submission of details) of listed building consent 19/07086 (Landscaping works to rear garden including retention of existing walls; reconfiguration of subterranean swimming pool structure so that the total area accords with previous planning permissions PP/09/00410 and PP/11/00251; omission of previously granted passenger lift to swimming pool area; installation of internally mounted air handling units and externally mounted air conditioning condenser unit located within acoustic enclosure behind freestanding garden trellis to garden; and infilling a strip of land between swimming pool and mews house at no. 7 Holland Park Mews to accommodate water retention tanks)***WITHDRAWN***
